coupleSection.firstText: Welcome to our wedding website – we’re so glad you’re here!
coupleSection.secondText: We’ve created this website as a helpful resource for all of the need-to-know details in the lead up to our big day. Here you’ll find our schedule of timings and venue directions, along with our bridal party introductions and relationship history.
coupleSection.thirdText: We’d love for you to take a look around to learn more about our wedding day plans. Don’t forget to RSVP and let us know about any dietary preferences, too. (ovo-lacto vegetarian, vegan, intolerant, children's menu).
coupleSection.forthText: And finally, thanks so much for all of your love and support so far! We can’t wait to celebrate this special day with all of our favourite people.

countdownSection.counterHeader: We will become a family in

story.firstText: It all began on a hot summer night back in 2014. We met through a friend, but had no idea that 6 years later we`d find ourselves so in love.
story.secondText: We hung out a few times, sent lots of messages back and forth and spending time together finding out how much we have in common and finally we became a couple. It wasn`t long before we knew that we`d be together forever. We were best friends, true loves and badass partners in life.
story.thirdText: As years passed by, we felt more and more that we are meant to be and we couldn`t help falling in love with eachother and in September 2020 we got engaged. And the rest is history…
story.forthText: We`re finally ready to make it official!
